contentList.content: Attacks with your pact weapon deal [1].
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> to maintain <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> on a spell.
When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you can pull the creature up to [1] towards you.
When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> it reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].

Your patron grants you the power of fire and brimstone. You learn the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_FireRay_Warlock">Rays of Fire</LSTag> cantrip. It is also affected by your Eldritch Invocations that affect <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>.
Also affected by your Eldritch Invocations that affect <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>.

Pleased with your service, your otherworldly patron added new boons to the terms of your pact.

Blade pactholders gain an extra attack with their pact weapon.

The Pact of the Chain's familiar also gains an extra attack.

Pact of the Tome warlocks can cast Animate Dead, Haste, Call Lightning once per long rest.

For Pact of Destruction warlocks, Eldritch Invocations that affect Eldritch Blast now affect all Fire spells.
